com.blade.kit.json

类 JsonSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blade.kit.json.JsonSerializer

  • public class JsonSerializer
extends Object

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法

    • 方法详细资料

      • serialize

        public static String serialize(Object object)
                        throws IllegalArgumentException
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • deserialize

        public static Object deserialize(String json)
                          throws ParseException
        Deserializer a json string to data object
        参数:
        json - the json string which will be deserialized
        返回:
        the data object made from json
        抛出:
        ParseException - thrown when parsing a illegal json text
